import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { showMenu = false; toggleNavbar(){ this.showMenu = !this.showMenu; } }
